CustomField.formula: IF( Quote_Type__c == 'Amendment' && ISPICKVAL(Amendment_Action__c, 'Added Plant') , ( Quote_Line__r.SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c ) , if( Quote_Type__c == 'Amendment' && ISPICKVAL(Amendment_Action__c, 'Removed Plant') , ( 1-Quote_Line__r.SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c) , Quote_Line__r.SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c ))
CustomField.label: PPT Prorate Multiplier
